Posts.Content: proyalty wrote: I am disgnosed with invasive ductal carcinoma. I am waiting for surgery date. I will have a lumpectomy with breast implant removal and radiation. Any others out there with fibromyalgia and how radiation will effect those of us who have it??? Dx 2/28/2013, IDC, 2cm, Stage I, Grade 2 Log in to post a reply
